isis.stitle: TSI 08-03-01 - IROS Spring Hanger Replacement Kit (All Models)

subjectgroup.subject: IROS Spring Hanger Replacement Kit (All Models)

geninfo.para: In an effort to standardize service parts, International is no longer servicing the IROS suspension spring hanger p/n 3545280C1. Instead, a kit p/n 2591842C92 is available as a replacement.

svcproc.title: SERVICE PROCEDURE

warning.para: To avoid personal injury or death, shift transmission to park or neutral, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.

svcproc.para: The 2591842C92 kit contains two spring hanger brackets, one three piece crossmember, and required fastener hardware. Both new hangers must be installed along with the crossmember on a 4x2 truck. In the case of a 6x4, it is acceptable to only replace the brackets and crossmember on one of the drive axles providing the other axle has no bracket or mounting problem. The holes in the frame rail for mounting the spring hanger will need to be enlarged to accept the new 20mm fasteners. A 20mm ream should be used to enlarge the holes. The new holes should be just large enough that the new fasteners will barely fit through them. The 20mm fasteners should be torqued to 425 - 460 ft. lbs. The 16mm fasteners should be torqued to 200- 240 ft. lbs.
